languages.text: "Я говорил вам, Лорд-капитан? Экипаж отметил, что вы перестали, эээ, наносить визиты на нижние палубы, и молил передать свои глубочайшие благодарности за ваше милосердие".
"Did I tell you, Lord Captain? The crew noticed that you have stopped your... ah... visits to the lower decks, and begged me to convey their deepest gratitude for your mercy."
languages.original_text: "Я говорил вам, Лорд-капитан? Экипаж отметил, что вы перестали, эээ, наносить визиты на нижние палубы, и молил передать свои глубочайшие благодарности за ваше милосердие".

traits.locale_text: "Did I tell you, Lord Captain? The crew noticed that you have stopped your... ah... visits to the lower decks, and begged me to convey their deepest gratitude for your mercy."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Did I tell you, Lord Captain? The crew noticed that you have stopped your... ah... visits to the lower decks, and begged me to convey their deepest gratitude for your mercy."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Did I tell you, Lord Captain? The crew noticed that you have stopped your... ah... visits to the lower decks, and begged me to convey their deepest gratitude for your mercy."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Did I tell you, Lord Captain? The crew noticed that you have stopped your... ah... visits to the lower decks, and begged me to convey their deepest gratitude for your mercy."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: “舰长大人，我是否向您汇报过？自从您停止……嗯，造访……下层甲板后，船员们都十分欣喜，并特地托我向您传达，他们永远感激您的仁慈。”
languages.original_text: "Did I tell you, Lord Captain? The crew noticed that you have stopped your... ah... visits to the lower decks, and begged me to convey their deepest gratitude for your mercy."

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人，我是否向您汇报过？自从您停止……嗯，造访……下层甲板后，船员们都十分欣喜，并特地托我向您传达，他们永远感激您的仁慈。”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « Vous l'ai-je déjà dit, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine} ? Les membres de l'équipage ont remarqué que vous aviez cessé de... euh... vous rendre sur les ponts inférieurs, et m'ont demandé de vous transmettre leurs plus sincères remerciements. »
languages.original_text: "Did I tell you, Lord Captain? The crew noticed that you have stopped your... ah... visits to the lower decks, and begged me to convey their deepest gratitude for your mercy."

traits.locale_text: « Vous l'ai-je déjà dit, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine} ? Les membres de l'équipage ont remarqué que vous aviez cessé de... euh... vous rendre sur les ponts inférieurs, et m'ont demandé de vous transmettre leurs plus sincères remerciements.
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: «¿Se lo había dicho, Lord Capitán? La tripulación se ha fijado en que ha puesto fin a sus... eh... visitas a las cubiertas inferiores, y me ruegan que le transmita su más sincera gratitud por su clemencia».
languages.original_text: "Did I tell you, Lord Captain? The crew noticed that you have stopped your... ah... visits to the lower decks, and begged me to convey their deepest gratitude for your mercy."

traits.locale_text: «¿Se lo había dicho, Lord Capitán? La tripulación se ha fijado en que ha puesto fin a sus... eh... visitas a las cubiertas inferiores, y me ruegan que le transmita su más sincera gratitud por su clemencia».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「あなたにお伝えしたでしょうか、ロード・キャプテン？乗組員たちは、あなたが…下甲板に来るのをやめたことに気づき、あなたの慈悲に深く感謝していることを私に伝えてほしいと懇願したのです」
languages.original_text: "Did I tell you, Lord Captain? The crew noticed that you have stopped your... ah... visits to the lower decks, and begged me to convey their deepest gratitude for your mercy."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたにお伝えしたでしょうか、ロード・キャプテン？乗組員たちは、あなたが…下甲板に来るのをやめたことに気づき、あなたの慈悲に深く感謝していることを私に伝えてほしいと懇願したのです」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Habe ich es Euch gesagt, Lord Captain? Der Crew ist aufgefallen, dass Ihr Eure ... äh ... Besuche auf den Unterdecks eingestellt habt, und hat mich angefleht, Euch ihren tiefsten Dank für Eure Gnade zu übermitteln."
languages.original_text: "Did I tell you, Lord Captain? The crew noticed that you have stopped your... ah... visits to the lower decks, and begged me to convey their deepest gratitude for your mercy."

traits.locale_text: "Habe ich es Euch gesagt, Lord Captain? Der Crew ist aufgefallen, dass Ihr Eure ... äh ... Besuche auf den Unterdecks eingestellt habt, und hat mich angefleht, Euch ihren tiefsten Dank für Eure Gnade zu übermitteln."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.original_text: "Did I tell you, Lord Captain? The crew noticed that you have stopped your... ah... visits to the lower decks, and begged me to convey their deepest gratitude for your mercy."

languages.text: "Söylemiş miydim Lord Kaptan? Mürettebatınız, alt güvertelere yaptığınız... Ee... Ziyaretleri sonlandırdığınız için size minnettar. Şükranlarını size bizzat aktarmamı rica ettiler."
languages.original_text: "Did I tell you, Lord Captain? The crew noticed that you have stopped your... ah... visits to the lower decks, and begged me to convey their deepest gratitude for your mercy."

traits.locale_text: "Söylemiş miydim Lord Kaptan? Tayfanız, alt güvertelere yaptığınız... Ee... Ziyaretleri sonlandırdığınız için size minnettar. Şükranlarını size bizzat nakletmemi rica ettiler."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion
